topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5592c70f63687262b00004da#post_5592c70f63687262b00004da
Oh no I'm a white man! 

How am I going to Dance and make fried chicken now! My speech is changing to!

Goddangit-GASP its already started.

OOOOH NOOO-Hello Neighbor. What a fine morning to go to my office job and work to pay the rent for my families home.

*Bark Bark* 

Oh hi betty! Who's a good girl! 

Well I'm off to work. have a nice morning Neighbor! 
!http://thinkprogress.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/10/Backlog-Mr-Rogers.jpg!

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

topics.body:
Speaking of Postal. I saw the movie. Yep. It was one of Uwe Bills best. And by that I mean it still sucked and was a terrible adaptation of Postal.

Why? There was not one single scene of Postal Dude getting fed up with the crap around him and going Postal.
